2.Pros: Easy work, flexible schedule, and free food
2.Cons: It's Mcdonald's. The people their are unpleasant.

6.Cons: Terrible upper-management. Managers treat crew very poor. Seemingly always understaffed. Dealt with crew not showing up for shifts for no reason ALL THE TIME.

7.Pros: I got a free meal every time I worked, very flexible schedule.
